Description.0: 10 SAGE, 25 ACP and 15 ECU per Breaching Pod.
Description.1: The Second largest standard ship in service and the largest star class ever produced as of the second generation.
Description.2: Unlike the other gem type star classes, the Sapphire Star was a rare, this was mainly due to crew requierments and their status as a fragship.
Description.3: Only five of these ships where built but, like all Avingarde ships of this scale, only one was needed to win wars.
